name: THE FARMER (MisterAzix, MerlinWasTaken, Niweb, Alexdup1, anais-mcho)
name_original: THE FARMER (MisterAzix, MerlinWasTaken, Niweb, Alexdup1, anais-mcho)
description:
DESCRIPTION

The Farmer is a 3D horror game, where you play Adam : a desperate man who was enlisted in a sect. To reveal the Prophet's greatness to the world, his mission is to find and restore the Sacret Amulet's fragments. But one problem is up... These fragments are scattered over a farmer's land, who isn't really welcoming... 

It's up to you to escape him and succeed in your mission !

CONTROLS
  • Move : Z Q S D
  • Run : Shift
  • Crouch : C
  • Pick up object : E
CREDITS Made by :
